=Functionalities=

==1. Map==

The default page of this application is a world map based on the Google Maps Android API v2.

===1.1 Default Map Properties Settings===

 * The default location of the Google Map is set to London, in this Application it is modified to HKUST with proper Latitude and Longitude (22.3375, 114.2630) and proper zoom in scale (13).
 * The default Map Type is set to "Normal".

===1.2 Drawing on the Map===

====1.2.1 Marker====

 * The user can draw a marker on the map by creating a event.
 * The user can draw a marker on the map by search on a place.
 * The user can draw a marker on the map by click on the map.
 * Click on the existing marker could show the info window of the specific event.
 * Click and drag the marker can change the position of the marker, after dragging there will be a popup window asking whether to change the location of the event to the newer position.
 * The user can define the colour of the marker to categorize his event.

====1.2.2 Info Window====

 * The info window will pop up if the user clicked on the event marker.
 * The info window will pop up if the user clicked on the event from the event list.
 * Once an event is created or edited under the Map page, the info window and the marker of the event will automatically show up.
 * Click on the info window will bring the user to the event page, showing the detailed information of the specific event.
 * The title of the info window should be the title of the event.
 * The content of the info window should be the Date, Time and Location of the event.

====1.2.3 Shapes====

 * Polylines are used to show the proper guidance on how to reach the destination.

==2. Event List==

===2.1 Event Creation===
It requires the user to enter the following information: Name of the event, Date and time, location(to be confirmed upon a map), event type and optional fields including:  timed reminder, description and transportation type.

===2.2 Event Name===
It must consist of at least 1 character and at most XXX characters. Space, special characters will not be accepted as the first character, other than that, there are no further restrictions.

===2.3 Date and time===
User will be required to input the time in either am/pm format or 24-hour format.

===2.4 Location===
User will be required to first input the location, and clicked search. A map will be showed with a marker on the particular location. User will be required to confirm whether the marker is at the correct position. User can also perform various task like changing location by dragging the marker. (for more information, please refer to requirement XXX)

===2.5 Event type=== 
User will be required to set whether the event is a compulsory or optional one.  (XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXxx if compulsory? If optional?)

===2.6 Timed reminder===
User may initiate the reminder function for the event by setting a time for the notification to pop up. Note that the time can not be later than the time of the event.

===2.7 Description===
User may add any remarks about the event.

===2.8 Transportation type===
User may select from a few choices like bus, on foot, MTR, minibus...etc  (PROBLEM, USER MAY TAKE A FEW TRAFFIC TOOLS TO GO THERE)

===2.9 Event manipulation===
 * Clicking "Add", the event will be added to the event list, Clicking Cancel (or return ), a message will be prompted to ask whether you are sure to return before going back to the map or event list(depending on where you jump into add section).
 * Click any event, then click "modify", the edit event page will be prompted with same input field as add event page. All information can be modified as long as the changes is valid.
 *Click any event, then click "delete", a warning message will be prompted to confirm the changes. Click "confirm", the specific event will be deleted. Click "Cancel", it will return to the page you are in before clicking delete..
